General.Name: Molinos Agro SA
General.Description: Molinos Agro S.A. produces and sells soybean meal and oil, wheat, and corn in Argentina and internationally. The company also provides animal feeds, including pet, poultry, pork, and dairy food products; and constructs and operates a biodiesel plant. In addition, it exports hipro soy meal, soy hull pellets, crude soy oil, soy lecithin, biodiesel, refined glycerin corn, and wheat. The company is based in Victoria, Argentina.
